Detailed Description

Validates alias names entered in the AliasNameDialog.

Since an alias simulates a single chemical element (which is defined by a group of chemical elements), it must follow the naming convention for chemical element symbol names: first letter in upper case and all following letters in lower case which implies that it consists of alphabetical letters only (no numbers, no special characters). Example: Aaa, Tri, Gui, Gjkher allowed
